name: Choop is Hungry II: Treacherous Platforms
name_original: Choop is Hungry II: Treacherous Platforms
description:
A sequel to Choop is Hungry, this game may look simple at first, but you'll soon find that getting the three grapes may be more difficult than you thought!

Note: to play the game, you must download the zip folder, extract all the components, and then click on the .exe file. The game won't run without the data folder.

Use the arrow keys to move and rotate, and space bar to jump. Good luck! --Kenneth Burchfiel

Note: I've tested the game only for Windows. It may or may not work on other platforms.
